ArgonTest.Name: Modify Field (Purity Error)
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Ar._
class MyClass <: Object public new() field msg = 'Hello World' end
field var msg: String
public def _.msg: String = msg public def _.msg:=(value: String): Unit = msg := value end
proc main(): Unit do val o = MyClass.new() o.msg := 'Goodbye World' puts o.msg end
